title: OpenSea is Open to being acquired: Report

title: GBTC sees historic low in outflows as Bitcoin ETFs gain traction
description: In a notable shift in cryptocurrency market dynamics, the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) has experienced a significant reduction in outflows, marking a record low since its inception. title: Why do Spot XRP ETFs need Futures ETF precedent?
